thread.title: Discounts for Senior, Group, Auto-Club Members at Baymont Inn & Suites

title: Discounts for Senior, Group, Auto-Club Members at Baymont Inn & Suites
text:
Home > Hotel Deals > Discounts for Senior, Group, Auto-Club Members at Baymont Inn & Suites Discounts for Senior, Group, Auto-Club Members at Baymont Inn & Suites by Patricia Magaña , SmarterTravel Staff - September 9, 2015 at 3:26 PM 
Baymont Inn & Suites offers discounts for specific groups, including members of auto clubs, AARP, seniors, and government employees, among others. Discounts range from 10 to 20 percent off room rates, depending on demographic. 
Some popular Baymont hotels include:
